body.p: Allen Atchison states that at the present term of the Fayette Circuit court he was indicted for dealing Faro & has confessed Judgment He did so, because it is true that on a few one occasion & for small sums he had done so -- He is poor & feeble of health & not able to pay the whole of the fine -- He says he is young & defendent & simply & truthfully states the whole matter and asks for mercy and hopes he will not be ruined & put to prison for indiscretion in dealing but one game -- He hopes for mercy & promises reformation.

John G Kiser
Wm H Kane

Among the attached names are some of our best citizens -- I know Allen Atchison & believe his statements. I have had no connection with this case as Lawyer or otherwise
